title: Find Longest Sub-string without any Repeating characters.
content: A substring is a contiguous sequence of characters within a string. For instance, "the best of" is a substring of "It was the best of times". This is not to be confused with subsequence, which is a generalization of a substring. For example, "Itwastimes" is a subsequence of "It was the best of ti

content: <span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: justify;">We are given an array of distinct integers and along with it a sum value. title: Find all possible palindromic partitions in a given string
